banner.transformingWorkforce: Transforming your workforce and customer interactions with innovative recruitment, telemarketing, and customer service solutions.

recruitmentPage.revolutionizingRecruitment: Revolutionizing Recruitment in Tech, Corporate and Education.
recruitmentPage.introText: In today's highly competitive job market, finding top talent that perfectly aligns with your organization's needs and values is no easy feat. That's where Teazeap steps in, redefining the landscape of recruitment in the tech, corporate, and educational sectors. As a leading recruiting company, Teazeap is dedicated to providing innovative solutions that bridge the gap between exceptional talent and forward-thinking organizations. With a distinct focus on these three sectors, Teazeap combines cutting-edge technology, industry expertise, and a passion for connecting professionals with their dream careers.
recruitmentPage.stepsTitle: Our Strategic Approach To Providing Recruitment Services

1.title: TARGETED EXPERTISE FOR SPECIALIZED SECTORS
1.content: Our industry-focused recruitment experts possess deep knowledge in tech, corporate, and educational sectors, enabling us to identify top talent and seamlessly align them with our clients' specific requirements.

2.title: INNOVATIVE TECH FOR EFFICIENT OPERATIONS
2.content: Leveraging innovative tools, AI, and data analytics, we streamline recruitment processes, reducing time-to-hire and providing our clients with a competitive edge in accessing qualified talent efficiently.

3.title: PERSONALIZED APPROACH FOR TAILORED CONNECTIONS
3.content: Understanding the unique values and aspirations of candidates and clients, we forge meaningful connections, offering tailored recommendations that drive long-term success and foster strong relationships for mutual growth and fulfillment.

recruitmentPage.startedContent: Teazeap embarked on its journey with a primary emphasis on talent acquisition within the educational sector. However, over time, the organization evolved into a well-rounded provider of recruitment solutions, telemarketing services, and call center operations. Teazeap's expanded scope encompassed various types of teaching professionals, including full-time educators, part-time instructors, and substitute teachers.

tech.name: Tech
tech.description: Teazeap's prowess in the tech industry stems from its ability to curate a network of top-tier tech talent, ensuring a competitive edge in the recruitment landscape. By staying at the forefront of industry trends and leveraging extensive industry knowledge, Teazeap consistently identifies exceptional candidates with specialized technical expertise. Its rigorous screening processes not only evaluate technical prowess but also assess cultural fit, resulting in optimal candidate placements for businesses seeking innovation and technological excellence. Companies we have worked with include MetroFuser and SoundCloud.

corporate.name: Corporate
corporate.description: Teazeap excels in the corporate industry by customizing recruitment solutions to meet each corporation's specific needs. With a deep understanding of corporate requirements and a proven track record, Teazeap successfully places qualified professionals in executive, managerial, and administrative positions. Notably, Teazeap has collaborated with industry-leading companies such as United Debt Settlement, Singulus LLC, and Gotham Ltd leveraging its comprehensive database and proactive sourcing techniques to connect them with candidates possessing the ideal qualifications, experience, and leadership skills that align with their unique cultures and strategic objectives.

educational.name: Education
educational.description: Teazeap's leadership in the education industry stems from its profound comprehension of the unique needs of educational institutions and its ability to connect them with highly qualified professionals. Whether schools require academic staff, administrative personnel, or specialized educators, Teazeap possesses the expertise to identify the ideal candidates. Notably, Teazeap has successfully partnered with renowned schools such as Ailyn English School, Kang Chiao School, and Yoder Bilingual Academy, leveraging its extensive network and sector knowledge to consistently match these institutions with qualified individuals who possess the requisite qualifications, experience, and passion for cultivating enriching learning environments and promoting academic excellence.

header.subHeader: Let us match you with the best professionals in the tech, corporate, and educational sectors. We look at the big picture, every detail, and find the perfect candidate for every client.
header.significant: We highly value your teaching career and its significance to us
header.profileSubHeader: Your teaching career is very important to us

telemarketingPage.introTitle: Let Us Build Your Telemarketing Phone Room
telemarketingPage.introText: Our team of experienced and skilled agents are dedicated to providing top-notch services to businesses of every scale. Whether it’s lead generation, increasing sales, or achieving your marketing objectives, we harness the potential of telemarketing to assist you in reaching your aspirations. Elevate your brand’s presence, engage with your precise audience, and foster the growth of your enterprise with Teazeap.
telemarketingPage.introText1: Get in touch with us today to explore how we can empower your business!
telemarketingPage.discoverTitle: A Look At Our Skilled Agents in Action
telemarketingPage.discoverText: Our agents are adept at generating high-quality leads for our clients. Through strategic prospecting and persuasive communication, they identify potential customers who are a perfect fit for your products or services. Their goal is to provide you with a steady stream of qualified leads, driving your business growth.

0.name: Tax Reduction
0.message: Experience seamless conversations between our telemarketing agents and clients, discussing tax matters.

1.name: Office Interior
1.message: Embark on an immersive tour of the vibrant Teazeap office, revealing modern workstations, collaborative meeting rooms, and top-quality call center services.

2.name: Debt Settlement
2.message: Listen to our telemarketing agents and clients discuss effective debt settlement strategies in real-time calls.

3.name: Equipment Financing
3.message: Teazeap's Michael Cole offers low-rate 100% financing with a professional approach to meet specific business needs.

4.name: Medical Insurance Benefits
4.message: Teazeap agents introduce potential additional medical insurance benefits to Marvel and refer licensed experts to determine eligibility and explore extra benefits.

5.name: Debt Settlement

6.name: Mortgage Costs
6.message: Teazeap agents discuss the potential to reduce mortgage costs and integrate debt, providing phone consultations for more information.

7.name: Our Office Interior
7.message: Experience the vibrant Teazeap office through an engaging video tour. Explore modern workstations, collaborative meeting rooms, and witness our passionate team delivering excellent call center services.

8.name: Agents at Work
8.message: Immerse yourself in the energetic atmosphere of the Teazeap office through captivating office images. Discover modern workstations and collaborative meeting rooms.

9.name: Mortgage Rates
9.message: Our agents discuss the potential for cash-out refinancing, obtaining fair rates, and arranging follow-up calls for mortgage inquiries.

10.name: Debt Settlement
10.message: Eavesdrop on calls: Telemarketing agents and clients discussing detailed debt settlement solutions in real-time.

1.title: UNDERSTAND CUSTOMER NEEDS
1.content: Teazeap would start by understanding the customer's business requirements, target audience, and sales goals. Based on this information, we would recommend the most appropriate virtual telemarketing service to meet the customer's needs.

2.title: CONFIGURE INFRASTRUCTURE
2.content: Once the service is chosen, Teazeap would configure the necessary infrastructure, including software, hardware, and network components. This would ensure that the virtual telemarketing service is set up correctly and functions optimally.

3.title: TRAIN AGENTS
3.content: Teazeap would provide comprehensive training to agents on how to use the virtual telemarketing service effectively, including best practices for managing calls, handling objections, and closing sales. This training would help agents to provide top-quality service to customers and achieve the customer's sales goals.

plan.subtitle: Our telemarketing services are tailored to meet your unique needs. First step is to decide which support you’re in search of:

0.name: Debt Settlement
0.message: "How many other outbound call centers did we try? At least 12 in India and the Philippines. They all failed because of the accents. Avatar & Echo telemarketing outsourcing works, the agents don't have accents and prospects listen to what they say."

1.name: Mortgage
1.message: "American-run, they get lead generation. Avatar & Echo delivers the lowest cost, qualified leads. Its as easy to get as signing up for their service. Listen to what they say – they know the business."

2.name: Insurance
2.message: With the RXR we manage our team and it feels like we are in the middle of the action. The software is amazing, and we run better than we did when we had the call center here. It's amazing that they turned the complex process of running a call center into a service!

telemarketingPage.headerSubTitle1: Maximize your business plan with a strategic approach to customer engagement, lead generation, and sales growth through our expert team of telemarketing agents.

singleAgent.introTitle: Let us build your virtual telemarketing phone room.
singleAgent.introText: When you’re ready to free yourself from a failure-ridden telemarketing process and try something that actually works, contact us. Teazeap Telemarketing specializes in outsourcing single agent telemarketing campaigns. These campaigns are hassle-free for you and provide real results. Our highly-trained, non-accented telemarketers have a proven track record of success. Single agents start at $9.5 per hour.
singleAgent.step4: Get us the credentials to set them up on dialers if needed
singleAgent.step5: Manage them as you would an in-office telemarketing agent

1.title: OUTSOURCE YOUR COLD CALLING
1.content: Unlock the power of outsourcing your telemarketing to drive unparalleled growth. Experience seamless hiring and cold calling with our live lead transfer program. Tailored for businesses needing one to a few live agents, our single agent telemarketing program delivers exceptional results.

2.title: EFFECTIVE TELEMARKETING WITH SINGLE AGENTS.
2.content:
At Teazeap, we redefine excellence in outsourcing by prioritizing quality over chance. Our rigorous selection process ensures that only the best-trained telemarketing agents, with experience and motivation, join our American-run call centers.

Our telemarketers are college graduates with telesales experience,self-managers, skilled in appointments,scripts,sales reporting

3.title: SKIP THE HEADACHE & STOP WASTING TIME
3.content:
We outsource only the best single agent telemarketers by providing all the following hiring requirements:
  • Background criminal checks
  • Office space
  • Speech training
  • Management
  • English comprehension testing

landing-page.goals: TeaZeaP services guarantee schools are connected and provided with the best school teachers. Full time, part time, and substitute teacher positions are available.TeaZeaP is here to support our partners. In addition to job placements our team is available to mediate between schools and teachers. This may include communicating, clarifying or solving any potential misunderstandings between the two parties. Mentorship and helpful resources are readily available to teachers.
landing-page.full-time-desc: Reliable and trustworthy teachers that are committed to working in harmony with their school full time in order to provide a fun and safe learning environment for students.
landing-page.part-time-desc: Reliable and trustworthy teachers that are committed to working in harmony with their school part time in order to provide a fun and safe learning environment for students.
landing-page.sub-desc: Reliable, and trustworthy teachers open to fill in when requested by a school and willing to meet their needs.
landing-page.chief-quote: “Recruitment is not just about filling positions; it’s about shaping careers, building dreams, and connecting the right people to the right opportunities.”
landing-page.project-quote: “As you navigate through the rest of your life, be open to collaboration. Other people and other people’s ideas are often better than your own.”
landing-page.comm-quote: “The success of every business is built on the foundation of support, both from within and from those who believe in its vision.”
landing-page.telemarketing-desc: Maximize Your Sales and Marketing Potential With Our Expert Telemarketers (Agents as low as $12 an hour)
landing-page.recruitment-desc: Expand Your Team with Teazeap: Connecting Exceptional Talent With Tech, Corporate, and Educational Sectors
landing-page.call-center-desc: Elevate Your Customer Success, Support, and Communication With Our Exceptional Customer Service Agents

contact.important: Your teaching career is very important to us.
contact.reach-out: Reach Out to Our Expert Team
contact.name: First Name...

teachers.success: Your success is important to us. TeaZeaP has curated partnerships with various employers looking to fill full-time, part-time, and substitute teacher positions. Through our platform you will be promoted as a candidate for a number of openings. If your resume is a good match for our clients’ needs, a recruiter will reach out to you to ensure the opportunity fits your goals and preferences. From there, our team will prepare you for every step of the hiring process, from the interview to placement. And even in helping you get settled in the apartment and city, you would like. We would have one of our team members accompany you all along the way.

schools.success: TeaZeaP services guarantee schools are connected and provided with the best school teachers. We will help them find the right full time, part-time, or substitute teacher at the time needed. TeaZeaP is here to support our partners. In addition to job placements our team is available to mediate between schools and teachers. This may include communicating, clarifying or solving any potential misunderstandings between the two parties. Mentorship and helpful resources are readily available to teachers. And besides our services go further, we even have the option of going abroad to the country of choice of the schools to fetch the right teachers for them.
